trans-unit.source: Provides the control adapter base class for the HTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供 HTML 配接器集的控制項配接器基底類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Writes a custom attribute access key method, provided that the device supports the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 寫入自訂屬性便捷鍵 (Access Key) 方法 (如果裝置支援這個屬性)。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter.AddAccesskeyAttribute%2A> method can be called by any HTML control adapter to add an attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter.AddAccesskeyAttribute%2A>可以將屬性的任何 HTML 控制項配接器所呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: Because it is virtual, it also can be customized by adapters that inherit this method.
trans-unit.target: 因為它是虛擬的它也可以自訂配接器，繼承此方法。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a device supports an access key attribute, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsAccesskeyAttribute%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷裝置是否支援存取索引鍵屬性，請使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsAccesskeyAttribute%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Writes additional attributes that are specific to an adapter.
trans-unit.target: 寫入配接器特定的其他屬性。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method from any control adapter to provide customization by inheriting adapters.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從任何可透過繼承的介面卡，提供自訂的控制項配接器呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to use to write the custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入自訂屬性的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write custom attributes for J-Phone multimedia attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可寫入 J-Phone 多媒體屬性的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter.AddJPhoneMultiMediaAttributes%2A> method writes the `src`, `soundstart`, `loop`, `volume`, `vibration`, and `viblength` attributes in `<a>` and `<input>` elements, if the device supports the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter.AddJPhoneMultiMediaAttributes%2A>方法寫入`src`， `soundstart`， `loop`， `volume`， `vibration`，和`viblength`屬性`<a>`和`<input>`項目，如果裝置支援的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a device supports an access key attribute, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsAccesskeyAttribute%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷裝置是否支援存取索引鍵屬性，請使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsAccesskeyAttribute%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called by any HTML control adapter to add the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 若要將屬性加入任何 HTML 控制項配接器可以呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Because it is virtual, it also can be customized by adapters that inherit this method.
trans-unit.target: 因為它是虛擬的它也可以自訂配接器，繼承此方法。

trans-unit.source: Exits any secondary user interface (UI) mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: 結束控制項的任何第二個使用者介面 (UI) 模式。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter.NotSecondaryUI>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlControlAdapter.NotSecondaryUI>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the form adapter for the form on which the associated control resides.
trans-unit.target: 從關聯控制項所在的表單擷取表單配接器。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The form adapter for the form on which the associated control resides.
trans-unit.target: 關聯控制項所在表單的表單配接器。

trans-unit.source: The current view state.
trans-unit.target: 目前的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state.
trans-unit.target: 載入檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: Returns a constant that defines a mode where no secondary user interface (UI) is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回常數，定義不顯示第二個使用者介面 (UI) 的模式。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*.
trans-unit.target: HTML 和 WML 配接器會設定支援呼叫的概念*第二個 UI*。

trans-unit.source: Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way that a Windows-based application shows dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 第二個 UI 是由控制項以顯示其他 UI 畫面的 Windows 架構應用程式顯示對話方塊的方式相同。

trans-unit.source: For more information about secondary user interfaces, see the [Adapter Sets Functionality](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7) documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需第二個使用者介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[配接器集功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7)文件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the page adapter for the mobile page.
trans-unit.target: 傳回行動頁面的頁面配置器。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The page adapter for the mobile page.
trans-unit.target: 行動頁面的頁面配置器。

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific markup for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 為相關聯的控制項產生目標特定的標記。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 要接收輸出的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Called by the control's Render method to perform rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由控制項的 Render 方法呼叫，用以執行呈現。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 要接收輸出的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Called by the control's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method to perform rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由控制項的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> 方法呼叫，用以執行呈現。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter> class, this method renders all the children of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter>類別，這個方法會呈現控制項的所有子系。

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Renders hidden field text for a control.
trans-unit.target: 呈現控制項的隱藏欄位文字。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The specified target (form or URL).
trans-unit.target: 指定的目標 (表單或 URL)。

trans-unit.source: Renders the opening tag of a link.
trans-unit.target: 呈現連結的開頭標記。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: This method automatically checks for the type of link and renders the appropriate markup language.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會自動檢查連結的類型，並呈現適當的標記語言。

trans-unit.source: The specified target can refer to another URL or to a form on the same page.
trans-unit.target: 指定的目標可以參考另一個 URL，或是在相同頁面上的表單。

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Renders the end tag of a link.
trans-unit.target: 呈現連結的結束標記。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The rendering parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呈現的參數。

trans-unit.source: The text specified for the label.
trans-unit.target: 為標籤指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: Renders a postback event as an anchor, with the text specified by the <paramref name="linkText" /> parameter as a label.
trans-unit.target: 將回傳事件呈現為錨定 (Anchor)，並將 <paramref name="linkText" /> 參數指定的文字當做標籤 (Label)。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The attribute name.
trans-unit.target: 屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The rendering parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呈現的參數。

trans-unit.source: Renders a postback event as an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 將回傳事件呈現為屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The rendering parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呈現的參數。

trans-unit.source: Renders a postback event reference.
trans-unit.target: 呈現回傳事件參考。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether an adapter, such as the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlCommandAdapter" /> class, generates markup that requires <see langword="<Form>" /> tags for form submission.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出配接器 (例如 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlCommandAdapter" /> 類別) 是否會產生標記 (Markup)，而此標記需要 <see langword="<Form>" /> 標記 (Tag) 以送出表單。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the adapter generates markup that requires <<see langword="Form" />> tags for form submission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果配接器產生需要的標記< <see langword="Form" /> >標記以送出表單; 否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlFormAdapter> class to determine whether the form tag is needed in the resulting markup.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性供<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlFormAdapter>類別以決定是否產生標記中需要表單標記。

trans-unit.source: Currently, only the settings on cHTML adapters are recognized.
trans-unit.target: 目前，只有 cHTML 介面卡上的設定會被辨識。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use this property to provide your own rendering in your adapters.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以使用這個屬性，在您的配接器提供您自己的轉譯。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the control saves its private view state.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項儲存其私用檢視狀態時，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Null" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="Null" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the secondary user interface (UI) mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定或傳回控制項的第二個使用者介面 (UI) 模式。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The secondary UI mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的任何第二個 UI 模式。

trans-unit.source: The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*.
trans-unit.target: HTML 和 WML 配接器會設定支援呼叫的概念*第二個 UI*。

trans-unit.source: Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way as a dialog box in a Windows-based application.
trans-unit.target: 第二個 UI 會使用需要其他 UI 畫面的顯示方式與在 Windows 架構應用程式的對話方塊相同的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about secondary user interfaces, see [Adapter Sets Functionality](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7).
trans-unit.target: 如需第二個使用者介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[配接器集功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7)。
